question.title: Convert the HTML Entities
question.content:
You are given a string “STR”, of characters and HTML entities, your task is to convert the given string’s HTML entities into their single characters and get the HTML string.

The entities used in this problem are :
" is the code used for quotation marks symbol: (“)
' is the code used for single quotation marks or apostrophe symbol: (‘)
< is the code used for less than symbol: (<)
> is the code used for greater than symbol: (>)
& is the code used for the ampersand symbol: (&)
/ is the code used for the slash symbol: (/)
\ is the code used for the backslash symbol: (\)
For Example :
“STR”: " Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events. "
Which on converting will look like: “Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events.”
Input Format :
The first line contains an integer ‘T’, which denotes the number of test cases or queries to be run. Then the test cases are as follows.

The first and the only line of each test case contains the string 'STR'.
Output Format :
For each test case, print the converted sentence.

Print the output of each test case in a separate line.
Note :
You don’t need to print anything. It has already been taken care of. Just implement the given function.
Constraints :
1 <= T <= 5
1 <= |STR| <= 10^5

String STR contains only lowercase letters.

Where ‘|STR|’, denotes the size of the string 'STR'.

Time limit: 1 sec
Sample Input 1 :
2
"Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events."
"Coding Ninjas is any coder's best friend."
Sample Output 1 :
“Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events.”
"Coding Ninjas is any coder's best friend."
Explanation of Sample Input 1 :
In the first test case, 
The string after entity parsing will look like this:
“Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events.”

In the second test case, 
The string after entity parsing will look like this:
"Coding Ninjas is any coder's best friend."
Sample Input 2 :
2
codingninjas.com/codestudio/problems
Happy Coding:)
Sample Output 2 :
codingninjas.com/codestudio/problems
Happy Coding:)

rephrased.body:
Given a string `STR` containing characters and HTML entities, convert the HTML entities into their corresponding single characters.  The following entities should be replaced:

*   `"` with `"`
*   `'` with `'`
*   `<` with `<`
*   `>` with `>`
*   `&` with `&`
*   `/` with `/`
*   `\` with `\`

Return the resulting HTML string.
constraints: String STR contains only lowercase letters.

testcases.input: "Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding &amp; participate in events.&quot;
testcases.output: "Coding Ninjas is a platform to practice coding & participate in events."
testcases.explanation: The HTML entities `"` and `&amp;` are replaced with their corresponding characters `"` and `&`.

testcases.input: "Coding Ninjas is any coder&apos;s best friend.&quot;
testcases.output: "Coding Ninjas is any coder's best friend."
testcases.explanation: The HTML entities `"` and `'` are replaced with their corresponding characters `"` and `'`.
The HTML entity `&sol;` is replaced with its corresponding character `/`.
No HTML entities are present, so the string remains unchanged.

hints: Try to find HTML entities in the given string.
